Yeah I think so too. It's the same with the other methods. Some days are be=
tter than others. Maybe it has to do with the surrounding conditions as wel=
l as our own energy levels. Not sure why sometimes they come in very clear =
and other times not so great.
=A0
Misty

I first tried EVP b=
ack in 1995, didn't get anything, and didn't try again till 2000, then it s=
tarted coming through. Even now there seems to be times when I don't get an=
ything, and I think it's just conditions, it's like they can't always get t=
heir signal through. 

F-S

I ask for their help.=A0 I am being patient with the process.

=A0 
> > >Thanks so much, Misty. I will see if I can ask them to speak as o=
ne, because I think you hit the nail right on the head -- I do hear them sp=
eaking over each other, half in male, half in female, so maybe things would=
 improve like you said if they organized into one collective voice. Can the=
y still answer questions about individuals this way, or are you limited to =
generalized queries?
> > >
> > >Regarding your statement: "Quite often when=
 a new speaker
> > >comes forth a bit of a training session can be heard fo=
r how they can
> > >speak so that my physical self can hear what is said." =
So by this, do you mean it's possible it takes a couple of sessions for the=
 entity to master this new method of communication? For instance, I got my =
grandmother' s name (among others) during Tuesday's session, but she said n=
othing, wouldn't answer our questions; Wednesday, she suddenly started talk=
ing and was the primary person we communicated with, even correctly answere=
d my mother's questions about her childhood pets. Could this be because the=
re's a learning curve involved with talking through the radio? Does it take=
 a session or two before they "get the hang of it"? Or is it all dependent =
on my skills?
> > >
> > >Oh, and wanted to say I'm going out tomorrow to bu=
y all the canned goods at the grocery store in anticipation of the nuclear =
winter we are about to endure... Just kidding. Hearing about all that stuff=
 they are predicting, it does make me wonder, though, why they would go to =
such trouble to tell you all that again and again -- what's to gain from it=
? It's not stirring anybody up. 
> > >
> > >
> >
>
